text: Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir kam, 600plan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko dɨvazimɨn itiar akamɨn itir dughiamɨn, gumazir 5plan moga gariba, me aseba fer biziba iniasa dɨpenimɨn aven ghue. Me ghua ofa gamir gumazibar korotiam ko, Godɨn ifongiam gɨfofoghamin marvir guar doziba ko, marvir guar me tememɨn dɨkɨrigha silvan noghezim ko, marvir guar me silvan kɨnimɨn ingarizim, me bar ada okɨmasa.
